# Aera External Contracts

This directory contains a subset of Aera contracts, adapted for integration testing.  

**Source:** https://github.com/aera-finance/aera-contracts-public/tree/main/v3
**Commit:** 9888a9e0d50fa38d4e86a69a8ebb9b605b08dafd

## Notes
- Imports have been updated to use relative paths and project-specific remappings.  
- Solidity pragma changed from `0.8.30` to `0.8.27` for compatibility.
